14 
15 int PclFilters::search_for_model(std::vector<RayTraceCloud> clusters,
16  std::vector<RayTraceCloud> model){
17 
18  pcl::KdTreeFLANN<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr search_tree = generate_search_tree(model);
19  float min_distance = 10000;
20  int correct_cluster;
21  std::vector<float> search_result;
22  for (int i = 0; i < clusters.size(); i++){
23  search_result = match_cloud(clusters.at(i),search_tree);
24  if(search_result[1] < min_distance){
25  min_distance = search_result[1];
26  correct_cluster = i;
27  }
28  }
29  std::cout << "Minimum distance found: " << min_distance << std::endl;
30  return correct_cluster;
31 }
32 
33 void PclFilters::ransac_recognition(std::vector<RayTraceCloud> models,
34  RayTraceCloud object)
35 {
36  pcl::recognition::ObjRecRANSAC recognition(40.0,5.0);
37  std::list<pcl::recognition::ObjRecRANSAC::Output> matchingList;
38  for(int i = 0; i< models.size(); i++){
39  QString name = "model_";
40  name.append(QString::number(i));
41  recognition.addModel(*models.at(i).cloud,*models.at(i).normals,name.toStdString());
42  }
43  recognition.recognize(*models.at(0).cloud,*models.at(0).normals,matchingList,0.99);
44 
45  std::cout << "size of list: " << matchingList.size() << std::endl;
46 }

48 Eigen::Matrix4f PclFilters::calculateInitialAlignment(RayTraceCloud source, RayTraceCloud target, float min_sample_distance, float max_correspondence_distance, int nr_iterations)
49 {
50  pcl::SampleConsensusInitialAlignment<pcl::PointXYZ,pcl::PointXYZ,pcl::FPFHSignature33> sac_ia;
51  sac_ia.setMinSampleDistance(min_sample_distance);
52  sac_ia.setMaxCorrespondenceDistance(max_correspondence_distance);
53  sac_ia.setMaximumIterations(nr_iterations);
54 
55  sac_ia.setInputSource(source.keypoints);
56  sac_ia.setSourceFeatures(source.local_descriptors);
57 
58  sac_ia.setInputTarget(target.keypoints);
59  sac_ia.setTargetFeatures(target.local_descriptors);
60 
61  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> registration_output;
62  sac_ia.align(registration_output);
63 
64  return (sac_ia.getFinalTransformation());
65 }
66 
67 Eigen::Matrix4f PclFilters::calculateRefinedAlignment(RayTraceCloud source, RayTraceCloud target, Eigen::Matrix4f initial_alignment, float max_correspondence_distance, float outlier_rejection_threshold, float transformation_epsilon, float eucledian_fitness_epsilon, int max_iterations)
68 {
69  pcl::IterativeClosestPoint<pcl::PointXYZ,pcl::PointXYZ> icp;
70  icp.setMaxCorrespondenceDistance(max_correspondence_distance);
71  icp.setRANSACOutlierRejectionThreshold(outlier_rejection_threshold);
72  icp.setTransformationEpsilon(transformation_epsilon);
73  icp.setEuclideanFitnessEpsilon(eucledian_fitness_epsilon);
74  icp.setMaximumIterations(max_iterations);
75 
76  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr source_transformed (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
77  pcl::transformPointCloud(*source.cloud,*source_transformed,initial_alignment);
78 
79  icp.setInputSource(source_transformed);
80  icp.setInputTarget(target.cloud);
81 
82  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> registration_output;
83  icp.align(registration_output);
84  return (icp.getFinalTransformation() * initial_alignment);
85 }

88 
89 RayTraceCloud PclFilters::calculate_features(RayTraceCloud inputcloud)
90 {
91  //Calculate normals, keypoints, local and global descriptor and return the model
92 
93  inputcloud.normals = get_normals(inputcloud.cloud,0.05);
94  inputcloud.keypoints = calculate_keypoints(inputcloud.cloud,0.001,3,3,0.0);
95  inputcloud.local_descriptors = calculate_local_descritor(inputcloud.cloud,inputcloud.normals,inputcloud.keypoints,0.15);
96  inputcloud.global_descriptors = calculate_vfh_descriptors(inputcloud.cloud,inputcloud.normals);
97  return (inputcloud);
98 }
99 
100 pcl::KdTreeFLANN<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr PclFilters::generate_search_tree(std::vector<RayTraceCloud> models)
101 {
102  //take global descriptors and put them in a kdtree
103  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr global_descriptor(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>);
104  pcl::KdTreeFLANN<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr search_tree(new pcl::KdTreeFLANN<pcl::VFHSignature308>);
105  for(int i = 0; i< models.size(); i++){
106 
107  RayTraceCloud model = models.at(i);
108  *global_descriptor += *(model.global_descriptors);
109  }
110  search_tree->setInputCloud(global_descriptor);
111  //std::cout << "Size of tree: " << global_descriptor->size() << std::endl;
112  return (search_tree);
113 }
114 
115 std::vector<float> PclFilters::match_cloud(RayTraceCloud object_model,
116  pcl::KdTreeFLANN<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr search_tree){
117  std::vector<float> returnvalues;
118  std::vector<int> best_match(1);
119  std::vector<float> square_distance(1);
120  //search_tree->nearestKSearch (object_model.global_descriptors->points[0],1,best_match,square_distance);
121  search_tree->nearestKSearch (object_model.global_descriptors->points[0],1,best_match,square_distance);
122  returnvalues.push_back(best_match[0]);
123  returnvalues.push_back(square_distance[0]);
124  return (returnvalues);
125 }
126 
127 std::vector<float> PclFilters::temp_matching_cvfh(RayTraceCloud object_model,
128  pcl::KdTreeFLANN<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr search_tree){
129  std::vector<float> returnvalues;
130  std::vector<int> best_match(1);
131  std::vector<float> square_distance(1);
132  //search_tree->nearestKSearch (object_model.global_descriptors->points[0],1,best_match,square_distance);
133  int nr_of_descriptors = object_model.global_descriptors->points.size();
134  for(int i = 0; i< nr_of_descriptors; i++){
135  search_tree->nearestKSearch (object_model.global_descriptors->points[i],1,best_match,square_distance);
136  std::cout << "loop nr: " << i << ", best match: " << best_match.at(0) << ", confidence level: " << square_distance.at(0) << std::endl;
137  }
138  //search_tree->nearestKSearch (object_model.global_descriptors->points[0],1,best_match,square_distance);
139  returnvalues.push_back(best_match[0]);
140  returnvalues.push_back(square_distance[0]);
141  return (returnvalues);
142 }

144 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::calculate_keypoints(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud,
145  float min_scale,
146  int nr_octaves,
147  int nr_scales_per_octave,
148  float min_contrast)
149 {
150  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr rgbcloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
151  pcl::copyPointCloud(*cloud,*rgbcloud);
152  for(int i = 0; i< rgbcloud->size(); i++){
153  rgbcloud->points[i].r = 255;
154  rgbcloud->points[i].g = 255;
155  rgbcloud->points[i].b = 255;
156  }
157  pcl::SIFTKeypoint<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::PointWithScale> sift_detect;
158  sift_detect.setSearchMethod (pcl::search::Search<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB>));
159  sift_detect.setScales (min_scale, nr_octaves, nr_scales_per_octave);
160  sift_detect.setMinimumContrast (min_contrast);
161  sift_detect.setInputCloud (rgbcloud);
162  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointWithScale> keypoints_temp;
163  sift_detect.compute (keypoints_temp);
164  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr keypoints (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
165  pcl::copyPointCloud (keypoints_temp, *keypoints);
166 
167  return (keypoints);
168 }
169 
170 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr PclFilters::calculate_local_descritor(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud,
171  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr normal,
172  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr keypoints,
173  float feature_radius)
174 {
175  pcl::FPFHEstimationOMP<pcl::PointXYZ, pcl::Normal, pcl::FPFHSignature33> fpfh_estimation;
176  fpfh_estimation.setNumberOfThreads(8);
177  fpfh_estimation.setSearchMethod (pcl::search::Search<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>));
178  fpfh_estimation.setRadiusSearch (feature_radius);
179  fpfh_estimation.setSearchSurface (cloud);
180  fpfh_estimation.setInputNormals (normal);
181  fpfh_estimation.setInputCloud (keypoints);
182  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr local_descriptors (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>);
183  fpfh_estimation.compute (*local_descriptors);
184 
185  return (local_descriptors);
186 
187 }

206 boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> PclFilters::visualize_normals(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double radius, int numOfNormals)
207 {
208  viewer.reset(new pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer ("3D Viewer",false));
209  viewer->addPointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> (cloud, "sample cloud");
210  viewer->addPointCloudNormals<pcl::PointXYZ, pcl::Normal> (cloud, get_normals(cloud,radius), numOfNormals, 0.05, "normals");
211  viewer->setPointCloudRenderingProperties (pcl::visualization::PCL_VISUALIZER_COLOR, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0, "normals");
212  viewer->initCameraParameters ();
213  filteredCloud = cloud;
214  return (viewer);
215 }
216 
217 std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr> PclFilters::cluster_extraction(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double distance)
218 {
219  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_f (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>), outcloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
220  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr incloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
221  pcl::copyPointCloud(*cloud,*incloud);
222 
223  // Create the segmentation object for the planar model and set all the parameters
224  pcl::SACSegmentation<pcl::PointXYZ> seg;
225  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers (new pcl::PointIndices);
226  pcl::ModelCoefficients::Ptr coefficients (new pcl::ModelCoefficients);
227  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_plane (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> ());
228  seg.setOptimizeCoefficients (true);
229  seg.setModelType (pcl::SACMODEL_PLANE);
230  seg.setMethodType (pcl::SAC_RANSAC);
231  seg.setMaxIterations (100);
232  seg.setDistanceThreshold (distance);
233  int i=0, nr_points = (int) incloud->points.size ();
234 
235  while (incloud->points.size () > 0.3 * nr_points)
236  {
237  // Segment the largest planar component from the remaining cloud
238  seg.setInputCloud (incloud);
239  seg.segment (*inliers, *coefficients);
240  if (inliers->indices.size () == 0)
241  {
242  std::cout << "Could not estimate a planar model for the given dataset." << std::endl;
243  break;
244  }
245 
246  // Extract the planar inliers from the input cloud
247  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZ> extract;
248  extract.setInputCloud (incloud);
249  extract.setIndices (inliers);
250  extract.setNegative (false);
251 
252  // Get the points associated with the planar surface
253  extract.filter (*cloud_plane);
254 
255  // Remove the planar inliers, extract the rest
256  extract.setNegative (true);
257  extract.filter (*cloud_f);
258  *incloud = *cloud_f;
259  }
260 
261  // Creating the KdTree object for the search method of the extraction
262  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>);
263  tree->setInputCloud (incloud);
264 
265  std::vector<pcl::PointIndices> cluster_indices;
266  pcl::EuclideanClusterExtraction<pcl::PointXYZ> ec;
267  ec.setClusterTolerance (0.01); // 2cm
268  ec.setMinClusterSize (200);
269  ec.setMaxClusterSize (25000);
270  ec.setSearchMethod (tree);
271  ec.setInputCloud (incloud);
272  ec.extract (cluster_indices);
273 
274  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr> clusters;
275  for(int i = 0; i< cluster_indices.size(); i++){
276  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr tmpcloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
277  pcl::copyPointCloud(*incloud,cluster_indices[i],*tmpcloud);
278  clusters.push_back(tmpcloud);
279  }
280  filteredCloud = combine_clouds(clusters);
281  return (clusters);
282 }
283 
284 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::plane_segmentation(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double distance)
285 {
286  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr incloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
287  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_plane (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
288  pcl::copyPointCloud(*cloud,*incloud);
289  pcl::ModelCoefficients::Ptr coefficients (new pcl::ModelCoefficients);
290  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers (new pcl::PointIndices);
291  // Create the segmentation object
292  pcl::SACSegmentation<pcl::PointXYZ> seg;
293  // Optional
294  seg.setOptimizeCoefficients (true);
295  // Mandatory
296  seg.setModelType (pcl::SACMODEL_PLANE);
297  seg.setMethodType (pcl::SAC_RANSAC);
298  seg.setDistanceThreshold (distance);
299  seg.setInputCloud (cloud);
300  seg.segment (*inliers, *coefficients);
301 
302  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZ> extract;
303  extract.setInputCloud (incloud);
304  extract.setIndices (inliers);
305  extract.setNegative (false);
306 
307  // Get the points associated with the planar surface
308  extract.filter (*cloud_plane);
309 
310  filteredCloud = cloud;
311  return (cloud_plane);
312 }

319 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr PclFilters::color_cloud(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, int r, int g, int b)
320 {
321  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr rgb_cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
322  pcl::copyPointCloud(*cloud,*rgb_cloud);
323 
324  //color all points white
325  for (int i = 0; i< rgb_cloud->points.size(); i++)
326  {
327  rgb_cloud->points[i].r = r;
328  rgb_cloud->points[i].g = g;
329  rgb_cloud->points[i].b = b;
330  }
331  return (rgb_cloud);
332 }

334 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr PclFilters::get_normals(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double radius)
335 {
336  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr normals_out (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>);
337  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ> ());
338  pcl::NormalEstimationOMP<pcl::PointXYZ, pcl::Normal> norm_est;
339  norm_est.setNumberOfThreads(8);
340  norm_est.setSearchMethod(tree);
341  norm_est.setRadiusSearch (radius);
342  norm_est.setInputCloud (cloud);
343  //norm_est.setSearchSurface (cloud);
344  norm_est.compute (*normals_out);
345  return (normals_out);
346 }

348 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::passthrough_filter(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double min, double max, std::string axis)
349 {
350  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
351  passfilter.setKeepOrganized(true);
352  passfilter.setInputCloud(cloud);
353  passfilter.setFilterFieldName(axis);
354  passfilter.setFilterLimits(min,max);
355  passfilter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
356  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
357  return (cloud_filtered);
358 }

381 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::shadowpoint_removal_filter(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double threshold, double radius)
382 {
383  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
384  shadowpoint_filter.setInputCloud(cloud);
385  shadowpoint_filter.setKeepOrganized(true);

393 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::statistical_outlier_filter(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, int meanK, double std_deviation_threshold)
394 {
395  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
396  statistical_outlier.setKeepOrganized(true);
397  statistical_outlier.setInputCloud(cloud);
398  statistical_outlier.setMeanK(meanK);

400  statistical_outlier.filter(*cloud_filtered);

405 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::combine_clouds(std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr> input)
406 {
407  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cluster_cloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
408  *cluster_cloud = *input.at(0);
409  for (unsigned i=0; i<input.size(); i++){
410  *cluster_cloud += *(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr) input.at(i);
411  }
412  return (cluster_cloud);
413 
414 }
415 
416 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr PclFilters::compute_cvfh_descriptors(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud)
417 {
418  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr descriptors(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>);
419  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr kdtree(new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>);
420  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr normals = get_normals(cloud,0.01);
421  // CVFH estimation object.
422 
423  pcl::CVFHEstimation<pcl::PointXYZ, pcl::Normal, pcl::VFHSignature308> cvfh;
424  cvfh.setInputCloud(cloud);
425  cvfh.setInputNormals(normals);
426  cvfh.setSearchMethod(kdtree);
427  // Set the maximum allowable deviation of the normals,
428  // for the region segmentation step.
429  cvfh.setEPSAngleThreshold(5.0 / 180.0 * M_PI); // 5 degrees.
430  // Set the curvature threshold (maximum disparity between curvatures),
431  // for the region segmentation step.
432  cvfh.setCurvatureThreshold(1.0);
433  // Set to true to normalize the bins of the resulting histogram,
434  // using the total number of points. Note: enabling it will make CVFH
435  // invariant to scale just like VFH, but the authors encourage the opposite.
436  cvfh.setNormalizeBins(false);
437  cvfh.compute(*descriptors);
438 
439  return (descriptors);
440 }
441 
442 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::bilateral_filter(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double sigmaS, double sigmaR)
443 {
444  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
445  pcl::FastBilateralFilterOMP<pcl::PointXYZ> bifilter;
446  bifilter.setInputCloud(cloud);
447  bifilter.setSigmaR(sigmaR);
448  bifilter.setSigmaS(sigmaS);
449  bifilter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
450  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
451  return (cloud_filtered);
452 }

454 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::ESFSignature640>::Ptr PclFilters::calculate_esf_descriptors(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud){
455 
456  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::ESFSignature640>::Ptr descriptor(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::ESFSignature640>);
457  pcl::ESFEstimation<pcl::PointXYZ, pcl::ESFSignature640> esf;
458  esf.setInputCloud(cloud);
459  esf.compute(*descriptor);
460  return (descriptor);
461 }
462 
463 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr PclFilters::calculate_ourcvfh_descriptors(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr normal){
464 
465  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr descriptors(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>);
466  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr kdtree(new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>);
467  pcl::OURCVFHEstimation<pcl::PointXYZ, pcl::Normal, pcl::VFHSignature308> ourcvfh;
468 
469  ourcvfh.setInputCloud(cloud);
470 
471  ourcvfh.setInputNormals(normal);
472 
473  ourcvfh.setSearchMethod(kdtree);
474 
475  ourcvfh.setEPSAngleThreshold(5.0 / 180.0 * M_PI); // 5 degrees.
476 
477  ourcvfh.setCurvatureThreshold(0.1);
478 
479  ourcvfh.setNormalizeBins(false);
480 
481  // Set the minimum axis ratio between the SGURF axes. At the disambiguation phase,
482  // this will decide if additional Reference Frames need to be created, if ambiguous.
483  ourcvfh.setAxisRatio(0.8);
484 
485  ourcvfh.compute(*descriptors);
486 
487  return (descriptors);
488 }
489 
490 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::GFPFHSignature16>::Ptr PclFilters::calculate_gfpfh_descriptors(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud){
491 
492  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZL>::Ptr object(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZL>);
493  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::GFPFHSignature16>::Ptr descriptor(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::GFPFHSignature16>);
494 
495  pcl::copyPointCloud(*cloud,*object);
496 
497  // Note: you should now perform classification on the cloud's points. See the
498  // original paper for more details. For this example, we will now consider 4
499  // different classes, and randomly label each point as one of them.
500  for (size_t i = 0; i < object->points.size(); ++i)
501  {
502  object->points[i].label = 1 + i % 4;
503  }
504 
505  pcl::GFPFHEstimation<pcl::PointXYZL, pcl::PointXYZL, pcl::GFPFHSignature16> gfpfh;
506  gfpfh.setInputCloud(object);
507  gfpfh.setInputLabels(object);
508  gfpfh.setOctreeLeafSize(0.01);
509  gfpfh.setNumberOfClasses(4);
510  gfpfh.compute(*descriptor);
511 
512  return (descriptor);
513 }
514 
515 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr PclFilters::calculate_vfh_descriptors(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr points, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr normals){
516  pcl::VFHEstimation<pcl::PointXYZ, pcl::Normal, pcl::VFHSignature308> vfh_estimation;
517  vfh_estimation.setSearchMethod (pcl::search::Search<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>));
518  vfh_estimation.setInputCloud (points);
519  vfh_estimation.setInputNormals (normals);
520  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr global_descriptor (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>);
521  vfh_estimation.compute (*global_descriptor);
522 
523  return (global_descriptor);
524 }
525 
526 
527 
528 }
